attributes.description:
Brad New Opel Crossland
Standard Service plan of 3 years or 45 000km's
Standard Warranty of 3 Years or 120 000km's
Service intervals every 15 000km's or 12 months
OPEL's attention to detail comes to life in the new OPEL Crossland. Its distinctive new looks include its lowered, yet luxuriously longer bonnet with a steeper windscreen, resulting in a modern lower roofline – and dynamic stance on the road!
EXQUISITE INTERIOR
Performance style-design accents are visible throughout the new Crossland ergonomic interior with luxurious ambient lighting, such as clear and concise Driver Instrument Clusters and the flat-bottom steering wheel.
STYLISH WHEELS
Styllish 16 inch wheels to selected models to take you from the showroom into the spotlight!
Reversing just got safer and easier, especially in the city and narrow parking spaces. .
Experience a high level of connectivity with the new OPEL Corsa! It boasts a IntelliLink Touchscreen Infotainment System with Apple CarPlay™ and Android Auto™.
OPEL Crossland offers a total of 6 airbags including driver, passenger, side and curtain airbags to contribute towards the overall safety of your new Crossland and its occupants.
ISOFIX Child Seat Anchorage.
MULTI-FUNCTION STEERING WHEEL
Performance and style combine in the new OPEL Crossland, resulting in elegant driver enhancements such as the 3-spoke flat-bottom steering wheel with steering wheel controls for infotainment, DIC and other functions such as Cruise Control.
CRUISE CONTROL SPEED LIMI
